Text: The Zionists will do it again too.  they moved to the West and now run propaganda wars and hate speech laws to hinder criticism of their take over.

Zionists?!?  I guess to a person whose head is a hammer every problem looks like a nail...  The silly old distinctions of ethnicity, nationalism, religion, etc are no longer relevant.

It's the socialists (i.e. individuals opposed to complete Individual Freedom, including Property Rights) that are the real enemy of civilization, and, although history tends to move in zigzags, they are slowly losing their power.  Civilization sees government power as damage and routes around it!
